Does the product contain substances that have Endocrine Disrupting (ED) properties according to Regulation (EU) 2017/2100, or Commission Regulation (EU) 2018/605, or contain substances included in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern (REACH, Article 59 list) for having endocrine disrupting properties (Article 57(f)), in a concentrations exceeding 0.1% (w/w)? 
(Use LIST I & LIST III on https://edlists.org/ as a practical guide.)
answers.answer: Not intentionally added and reasonably not expected to be present above declaration limit.

answers.answer: Not intentionally added and reasonably not expected to be present above declaration limit
